text.config.SakuraLib.option.DEBUG.toolt:
This enables the debug mode which will produce more logs
in the console and dump created files to the disk.
text.config.SakuraLib.option.ALWAYS_ADD_: This also adds the example data outside of an development environment.
sakuralib_dynamic_book.name: Book of everything
sakuralib_dynamic_book.landing_text: This is a dynamically created book. It contains all entries from all mods that use SakuraLib's dynamic book system.
sakuralib_dynamic_book.minecraft.name: Minecraft
sakuralib_dynamic_book.minecraft.maintex: This is the main category containing descriptions about core minecraft features.
